title: Axiom Constraint Validation Domain (ACVD) Policy Schema
description: Defines the required fields and structural constraints for operational governance policies, ensuring compliance with Axiom III. Enhanced for AGI-KERNEL self-modification and auditing.

governance_policy_version.description: Immutable policy state identifier, mandatory for CSR trace generation.

policy_scope.description: Defines the operational domain this policy applies to (e.g., 'Evolution Pipeline', 'Nexus-Database', 'Infrastructure Authority').

minimum_utility_threshold.description: Explicit minimum utility value threshold (Omega_min) required to satisfy GAX I. Often correlated with normalized capability scores.

mandatory_schema_signatures.description: Cryptographic artifacts validating the ACVD structure against MPAM auditing standards.

operational_constraints.description: Detailed map of versioned system operation limits and rules enforced by ACVD, specifically targeting AGI evolution metrics.

agik_evolution_metrics.description: Mandatory tracking requirements aligned with AGI-KERNEL success indicators and stagnation protocols.

minimum_maturity_target.description: The minimum maturity level required for operations under this policy.

max_stagnation_cycles.description: The maximum allowed consecutive cycles without improvement before activating Stagnation Recovery Protocol.

minimum_capability_scores.description: Object detailing minimum required score thresholds for core capabilities.

infrastructure_authority.description: Constraints applied to autonomous infrastructure creation and self-modification actions.

manifest_justification_required.description: If true, requires detailed justification in manifest.json before execution.

rollback_mechanism_mandatory.description: If true, requires a tested rollback mechanism be defined for the change.
